channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Time to Force Putin to the Negotiating Table
item.description: He is clearly trying to play President Trump by talking peace while waging war. He will find that a very dangerous game.

item.title: Iowa's Sen. Ernst is serious: She's not running
item.description: Sen. Joni Ernst made it official Tuesday: She's not seeking reelection.

item.title: Jesus Christ Takes Center Stage During College Football’s 2025 Opening Weekend
item.description: College football made its triumphant return to television screens across America this past weekend — and it did not disappoint. Whether it was Lee Cor...

item.title: Democrats Refusing Trump’s Help Prove Blue City Lawlessness Is A Choice
item.description: More than 50 people were shot in Chicago this past weekend — 8 of whom were killed. Instead of addressing the bloodshed, Democrat Mayor Brandon Johnso...

item.title: Institutionalize the Mentally Ill Homeless
item.description: Forcing people into treatment would raise the ACLU’s hackles, but it’s the only compassionate solution for people who cannot care for themselves.

item.title: The Tariff Power Still Belongs Only to Congress
item.description: Trump lost the case on his tariffs because only Congress has the power to tax.

item.title: The Genocide Lie Is Back
item.description: A new resolution condemning Israel is about as marred as the process that produced it.

item.title: Rep. Thomas Massie pushes forward with campaign to release Epstein files
item.description: Rep. Thomas Massie is plowing ahead with his plan to force the release of the Jeffrey Epstein files.

item.title: House GOP chairman to meet Epstein victims as file release vote looms
item.description: Ten victims of disgraced financier Jeffrey Epstein's sex trafficking ring will meet Tuesday with a top House Republican as the GOP grapples with a loo...

item.title: Christian Films Are A Welcome Change From Leftist Slop At The Kennedy Center
item.description: The Christian documentary The Revival Generation is a breath of fresh air in the wake of the woke programming at the Kennedy Center.

item.title: President Trump Is Right to Fight European Tech Overreach
item.description: The Old World model of state management must not be permitted to hold back the advance of the freedom-fueled dynamism of the New World.

item.title: D.C. Circuit Revokes ‘Abusive’ Injunction Barring Trump From Slashing EPA ‘Climate’ Grants
item.description: In a major win for the Trump administration, a D.C. Circuit Court panel lifted an injunction on Tuesday that attempted to block the Environmental Prot...

item.title: Biden Judge Blocks Trump Admin From Reuniting Unaccompanied Kids With Their Parents
item.description: It is totally implausible that the parents and family members of some 600 children are waiting to kill their kids when they come home.

item.title: Trump signals Space Command heading to Alabama
item.description: President Trump is set to announce that U.S. Space Command will move from Colorado to Alabama.

item.title: Appeals court sides with Trump's EPA in fight over Biden's last-minute climate grants
item.description: A federal appeals court backed the Trump administration in its effort to have the Environmental Protection Agency cancel billions of dollars in climat...
